record.name: Employment Status Change
record.description: Change the employment status information of an employee. Status changes include promotions. For transfers and terminations, please use the Department Transfer or Employee Termination request pages.
record.detailedDescription: Change the employment status information of an employee. Status changes include promotions. For transfers and terminations, please use the Department Transfer or Employee Termination request pages.
record.options: <form><select id="status" label="Status" type="combo"><option label="Full Time">fte</option><option label="Part Time">pte</option><option label="Leave">leave</option></select><text id="title" label="Title"/></form>
record.optionsAlias: <form><select id="status" label="Status" type="combo"><option label="Full Time">fte</option><option label="Part Time">pte</option><option label="Leave">leave</option></select><text id="title" label="Title"/></form>
